verses.plain: Then answered Bildad the Shuhite, and said,

tokens.t: Then answered Bildad the Shuhite, and said,

verses.plain: How long will it be ere ye make an end of words? mark, and afterwards we will speak.

tokens.t: How long
ye make an end of words? mark, and afterwards we will speak.

verses.plain: Wherefore are we counted as beasts, and reputed vile in your sight?

tokens.t: Wherefore are we counted as beasts,
reputed vile in your sight?

verses.plain: He teareth himself in his anger: shall the earth be forsaken for thee? and shall the rock be removed out of his place?

tokens.t: He teareth himself in his anger: shall the earth be forsaken for thee? and shall the rock be removed out of his place?

verses.plain: Yea, the light of the wicked shall be put out, and the spark of his fire shall not shine.

tokens.t: Yea, the light of the wicked shall be put out, and the spark of his fire shall not shine.

verses.plain: The light shall be dark in his tabernacle, and his candle shall be put out with him.

tokens.t: The light shall be dark in his tabernacle, and his candle shall be put out with him.

verses.plain: The steps of his strength shall be straitened, and his own counsel shall cast him down.

tokens.t: The steps of his strength shall be straitened, and his own counsel shall cast him down.

verses.plain: For he is cast into a net by his own feet, and he walketh upon a snare.

tokens.t: For he is cast into a net by his own feet, and he walketh upon a snare.

verses.plain: The gin shall take him by the heel, and the robber shall prevail against him.

tokens.t: The gin shall take
by the heel,
the robber shall prevail against him.

verses.plain: The snare is laid for him in the ground, and a trap for him in the way.

tokens.t: The snare
laid for him in the ground, and a trap for him in the way.

verses.plain: Terrors shall make him afraid on every side, and shall drive him to his feet.

tokens.t: Terrors shall make him afraid on every side, and shall drive him to his feet.

verses.plain: His strength shall be hungerbitten, and destruction shall be ready at his side.

tokens.t: His strength shall be hungerbitten, and destruction
ready at his side.

verses.plain: It shall devour the strength of his skin: even the firstborn of death shall devour his strength.

tokens.t: It shall devour the strength of his skin:
the firstborn of death shall devour his strength.

verses.plain: His confidence shall be rooted out of his tabernacle, and it shall bring him to the king of terrors.

tokens.t: His confidence shall be rooted out of his tabernacle, and it shall bring him to the king of terrors.

verses.plain: It shall dwell in his tabernacle, because it is none of his: brimstone shall be scattered upon his habitation.

tokens.t: It shall dwell in his tabernacle, because
none of his: brimstone shall be scattered upon his habitation.

verses.plain: His roots shall be dried up beneath, and above shall his branch be cut off.

tokens.t: His roots shall be dried up beneath, and above shall his branch be cut off.

verses.plain: His remembrance shall perish from the earth, and he shall have no name in the street.

tokens.t: His remembrance shall perish from the earth, and he shall have no name in the street.

verses.plain: He shall be driven from light into darkness, and chased out of the world.

tokens.t: He shall be driven from light into darkness, and chased out of the world.

verses.plain: He shall neither have son nor nephew among his people, nor any remaining in his dwellings.

tokens.t: He shall neither have son nor nephew among his people, nor any remaining in his dwellings.

verses.plain: They that come after him shall be astonied at his day, as they that went before were affrighted.

tokens.t: They that come after
shall be astonied at his day, as they that went before were affrighted.

verses.plain: Surely such are the dwellings of the wicked, and this is the place of him that knoweth not God.
